author: James Carville
title: OPINION: What Trump and the media are getting wrong about coronavirus
description: We don't have time to get distracted. We need a complete, scorched-earth change in communication strategy to win this war.
content: A few days ago, a good friend of mine, the brilliant John Barry, called me giddy about his op-ed in the New York Times illustrating the historical bridges between the COVID-19 crisis and the 1918 Spanish flu. The op-ed was excellent, a singularly informative … [+7268 chars]
